post.author: 관리자
post.content:
Contract position.............................................................

6 month contract (good probability of extension to 12-18 months) - client is well know telecommunication company (involved in wireless applications) - located in Toronto.

Strong knowledge and experience with Oracle databases (Unix platform - Solaris).

Strong knowledge of PL/SQL and scripting languages 었다x shell scripting, Korn and Bourne).

Experience with Java (J2EE) and javascript would be nice to have.
Pay is $50-60/hr.

If you are interested in the position, please send your resume to 'saewhankim@hanmail.net'.
post.title: Contract position- Unix,Oracle,PL/SQL
